00020 // Triangle Filter Method Definitions
00021 float TriangleFilter::Evaluate(float x, float y) const {
00022         return max(0.f, xWidth - fabsf(x)) *
00023                 max(0.f, yWidth - fabsf(y));
00024 }
00025 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Filter *CreateFilter(const ParamSet &ps) {
